an4.260:4.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅganteva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
an4.260:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño bhadro assājānīyo vaṇṇasampanno ca hoti, balasampanno ca, javasampanno ca, ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an4.260:4.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅganteva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
an4.260:5.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti … pe … anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa.
an4.260:5.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaṇṇasampanno ca hoti, balasampanno ca, javasampanno ca, ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an4.260:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti … pe … samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
an4.260:6.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaṇṇasampanno hoti.
an4.260:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya, thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an4.260:7.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu balasampanno hoti.
an4.260:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā … pe … sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an4.260:8.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu javasampanno hoti.
an4.260:9.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ārohapariṇāhasampanno hoti.
an4.260:10.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti … pe … anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassā”ti.
